title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: This Policy explains what data we collect, why it is necessary, and how we protect it.

intro.title: General provisions
intro.p1: This Privacy Policy describes how the Renterya platform collects, uses, and protects users’ personal data.
intro.p2: By using the Platform, you confirm that you have reviewed this Policy and agree to its terms.

data.title: What data we collect
data.p1: We may collect and process the following categories of data depending on how you use the Platform:
data.li7: technical data (IP address, device type, browser, session data).

purpose.title: Why we process data
purpose.p1: We use personal data solely to ensure the operation of the service and improve user experience, including for:
purpose.li4: processing support requests and chat responses;
purpose.li5: ensuring security, preventing fraud, and violations of rules;

payments.title: Payments
payments.p1: Renterya provides the ability to make online rental payments through third-party payment providers using bank cards and other available payment methods.
payments.p2: We do not store full bank card details or users’ payment data. Payment information is processed by payment providers in accordance with their privacy policies and security rules.
payments.p3: The platform may receive information about payment status, transaction amount, applied service commission, and technical transaction identifiers to display payment status, maintain records, and ensure service operation.

sharing.title: Data sharing with third parties
sharing.p1: We may share data only to the extent necessary for Platform operation in the following cases:
sharing.li1: with payment providers — for payment processing;
sharing.li2: with infrastructure providers (hosting, data storage, technical support) — to ensure service operation;
sharing.li3: upon lawful request of government authorities or a court;
sharing.li4: to prevent fraud or abuse when necessary to protect users and the Platform.
sharing.p2: We do not sell users’ personal data and do not share it with third parties for marketing purposes without your consent.

cookies.title: Cookies and analytics
cookies.p1: Renterya may use cookies and similar technologies to ensure proper Platform operation and improve user experience.
cookies.li3: analyzing service usage and improving functionality.
cookies.p2: You may restrict or disable cookies in your browser settings; however, this may affect the operation of certain features.

storage.title: Data storage
storage.p1: We store personal data only for as long as necessary to provide the service and fulfill legal obligations.
storage.p2: We apply technical and organizational measures to protect data from unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.

rights.title: User rights
rights.li1: obtain information about the data we process;
rights.li3: delete your account in profile settings;
rights.li4: withdraw consent to data processing where processing is based on consent;
rights.p2: To exercise your rights, please contact support.

deletion.title: Account deletion
deletion.p1: You may submit a request to delete your account through customer support.
deletion.p2: After account deletion, we may retain certain data only in cases and for periods required by law (for example, to fulfill legal obligations or resolve disputes).

security.title: Information security
security.p1: We use modern data protection methods; however, no method of internet transmission can guarantee absolute security. Please use strong passwords and do not share account access with third parties.

changes.title: Policy changes
changes.p1: We may periodically update this Policy. The current version is always available on the Renterya website.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.p1: If you have any questions regarding privacy or personal data processing, please contact us.
contacts.p3: Platform operator: Renterya (a project within The Emerald Group)
contacts.p4: Mailing address: Creative State Kyiv, Gulliver Mall, Kyiv, Ukraine
contacts.p5: We value your privacy and strive to provide a safe experience on Renterya.
